question: 月末
sourceMnemonic: You know how <ja>月</ja> can also mean <kanji>month</kanji>? If you add <ja>末</ja> on there you have the "month end" aka the <vocabulary>end of the month</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Since <ja>月</ja> has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember which one to use:

When it's the <vocabulary>end of the month</vocabulary>, everybody <reading>gets</reading> <reading>mats</reading> (<ja>げつまつ</ja>). We don't pay people in money at Tofugu, but everyone gets mats at the <vocabulary>month end</vocabulary> instead.
